verses.content: Hotuhai, nangni khawm vânah hotu in nei ti hrein, in suokhai chungah a fel le a mâwitâwk chu thaw ro.
Ṭawngṭai fan fan unla, chutaka chun lâwmthu hril pumin ngaiven ro.
Khuopa ka umna san, Krista thurûk chu hril dinga Pathienin thu ta dinga kawt a mi hawngpêk theina dingin, kei ngei khawm mi ṭawngṭai pêk ro;
ka hril ding ang taka ka puong theina dingin.
Remchângna inchaw peiin puo- tienga mihai lai chun vartakin um ro.
Mi tin iengtina dawn seng ding am a na ti in hriet theina dingin in ṭawng bausuok chu chia saw, lunginsietna ṭhang ni rawp raw se.
Lalpaa unau dittak, rawngbâwl- tu ringum, kan suok chanpui Tukik hin ka chanchin po po inhriettir a ti cheu.
Hi lei tak hin ama chu in kuomah ka hung tir a nih, kan chanchin in hriet theina ding le in lungril a sukthlamuong theina dingin;
Onisema, unau ringum le indiktak, nangni laia mi le hin. Anni chun hieng tienga thil umzie po po hi inhriettir an ti cheu.
Aristarka ka întângpuipa hin chibai a bûk cheu; Marka, Barnaba tupa khawm hin chibai a bûk cheu (ama chungchâng thua thupêkhai in hmu kha, in kuomah a hung chun lo lâwm ro).
Isu, Justa an ti hin chibai a bûk bawk cheu: chuonghai chu sertan mi an na, chuonghai chau chu Pathien ram thuah ka sinthawpui a mi thlamuontuhai an nih.

Epaphra, nangni laia mi, Krista Isu suokpa hin chibai a bûk cheu; ama chun Pathien dit zâwng ta- phawta puitling le ring tlatna neia in ngîr theina dingin a ṭawngṭaina- haia chun in ta dingin a thaw rawp a nih.
Nangni ta ding dâmin, Laodi- keia umhai ta ding dâmin, Hierapolia umhai ta ding dâmin ṭhahnem a ngai bêk bêk ti ka hrietpui a nih.
Dittak dâktawr Luka le Dema hin chibai an bûk cheu.
Laodikeia unau umhai kha chibai mi hung bûkpêk ro; Numpha le a ina kohran inkhâwmhai chu chibai mi hung bûkpêk bawk ro aw.
Chun, hi lekhathawn hi nangni laia in tiem zo hnungin Laodikei ko- hran khawm intiemtir ve ro; nangni khawmin Laodikeia inthawka le- khathawn kha lo tiem ve bawk ro aw.
Chun, Arkippa kuoma khan, “Rawngbâwlna Lalpaa i hmu kha hlen dingin fimkhur rawh,” ti ro aw.
Kei Paulain kut ngeia chibai ka bûkna cheu a ni hi, ka kawl bunhai hi hre zing ro. Lunginsietna in kuomah um raw se.
